Object.Description: The book that calls upon the gods of the crystal entities, the user of the tome is supported without question.
A hide formed from crystals found deep in the cavern, it has special properties of increasing your magical potential.
A backpack that will help you in your adventures!
The staff calls to the forest, aiding the user in battle with the forest spirits.
A helmet that brings hell everywhere it goes, not many things can stop its devastation.
This shield pushes forward a magical heat barrier around you to protect you and your allies.
This helm channels the power of the mighty treant to rejuvenate allies and boost their vitality.
A quiver that supports the user with magical healing abilities supported by its honey nature.
A quiver that would burn the users back if it wasn't for the ability to use magic to cool the heat.
A spell that summons the breath of a dragon upon your enemies.
A burning gemstone medallion attached to a necklace, shaped like a Sun.
The heat of its rage strikes the tip of the blade, pushing for the user to kill everything in sight.
The heat of its rage strikes the tip of the blade, pushing for the user to kill everything in sight.
A miracle this rose experienced as it survived the harsh conditions below, the warmth it radiates fills you with grace.
A wand that vivaciously exerts so much heat, it shoots erratically.
A blade that is fast and is always ready to kill.
A bow that shoots with the intention to kill with its first blow.
A band that mimics the ancient god, Beholder.
A band that mimics the ancient god, Medusa, forcing her to fight for you.
A band that mimics the ancient god of spirits, forcing him to fight for you.
Chainmail that takes the shape of a leather hide, maybe used for reinforcement.
A hide that provides protection with strong chainmail.
A staff held by the king of spirits, convers spirits into matter which can interact with objects outside the Ethereal.
No mortal can fire this bow without resting in between shots, meant to be used by the spiritual entities.
The helmet of the crystal depths commander, restored to its full potential and powers your allies with massive strength in batle.

Activate.text: The light reflects from our will!

Object.Description: A helmet that has no power left, forged in the depths of the crystal cavern and used to aid their army in combat.
A bow that contains various poisons from the forest and imbues the arrows it shoots with these poisons.
Leather armor pressured with the brutal lifestyle of the cyclops giants.
An armor that was made to combat enemies who use electricity to their advantage.
A pendant that reflects light in ways the enemies you approach could go blind by looking at the gemstone.

A crystal shield reinforced with ice magic and frozen gemstones named cubics, the initial shockwave of slamming the shield down as protection is enough to blast the enemies away with a freezing breeze.
A wand frozen over but burning using contained frost magic.
A staff frozen over but burning using contained frost magic.
A bow frozen over but burning using contained frost magic.
A sword frozen over but burning using contained frost magic.
The wearer can command the storm to rain lightning down on any of your opponents.
A thunderous wand, a wand of the thunder god, calls upon the clouds to rain lightning down on your opponent.
A well-made shortbow.
Armor made by the finest blacksmith and were given to kings, it has magical attributes that only show during battle.
Day and night, gladiators fought in a never ending war. The gladiators held these candles to light up their path in the night, without them, death would await the gladiators in the shadows.
The golden totem is a turret used in war, this helmet is what the invaders used that blocked the magic of the turret.
An angelic tome, empowered by divine might and justified by the souls of the righteous.

Only worn by the wise. A powerful relic owned by the masters of blacksmith, having Zeroth's eye pierced by a forbidden weapon, he could no longer see. Zeroth created this while being blind and is used to aid his masters with quality weapons.
The eye of a Cyclops, allows you to strike an enemy with precision.
An old amulet that uses burnt leather to attach itself to a giant skull, used for casting many death spells.
A Ghostly Pendant crafted for Ruthven, there's many stories of Ruthven, one of which deals with how he was in a band, it was named, Monster Mash.
A robe made from the fabric of souls, it consumes souls you release from your enemies, using them to protect the wearer.
A spell that was made to attack your enemy on a spiritual level.
A phantomic staff, it gathers its energy from the ethereal.
Consumes the living, drying enemies of their blood and supplying their owner with outrageous power used for throwing and commanding the pike.
A quiver that stores extremely sharp leaves.
A robe that provides evasion using the magic of the forest.
A hide that provides protection with strong leaves.
Named the Resistance because of the hardened scales it uses, the armor naturally adjusts to its surroundings.
Venom produced by this staff mummifies targets from the inside.
A sword made from baryte with the blade enhanced with electricity.
A sword made for the cult of admins.
Earrings named after the sound you hear everytime they rattle.
A amulet dropped from a hero who lost the battle to the Death Centipede, it shimmers whenever it touches electricity.
The hat of a pirate king, the signature of any pirate, Redbeard's hat is his prized posession.
Red beards precision is all behind this Marauder's Eye Patch, training his bad eye has allowed him to develop a deadly sniper eye.
The jacket of a pirate king, redbeard's mostly known for striking his enemies with unexpected power.
A basic wooden axe.
A basic wooden pickaxe.
A drill made from Uranium and Obsidian Wood.
A pickaxe made from Magma Stone and Iron wood.
A pickaxe made from Titanium and Iron wood.
A pickaxe made from Iron and Wood.
A pickaxe made from Stone and Wood.
A chainsaw made from Uranium and Obsidian Wood.
A axe made from Magma Stone and Iron Wood.
A axe made from Titanium and Iron Wood.
A axe made from Iron and Wood.
A axe made from Stone and Wood.
A wand that creates sharp leaves that soar through the sky at high speeds.
A key that opens the portal to the Silent Wilderness.
A key that opens the portal to the Silent Wilderness.
A leather quiver that stores wooden arrows.
Leaves wrapped around a leather quiver, allowing for a more agility.
A quiver that amplifies the bow being used supplying vine wrapped arrows.
A obsidian quiver that has harden sandstone around the edges, comes with obsidian edged arrows.
A poisonous quiver, withering enemies you hit with vicious attacks that denies them the ability to aid themselves.
An extremely cold quiver, just having it on your back gives you an uneasy feeling like you'll freeze to death.
A bottle of controlled acid, amplified to a consumable drink.
A bottle of uncontrollable acid, amplified to a consumable drink.
It has fermented under the sea for ages.
A well-made shortbow.
A well-made longbow.
A bow crafted from old wood, it creeks as you shoot.
A wooden bow that uses spider threads to enhance the power of the bow.
A wooden bow that uses spider threads to enhance the power of the bow.
A well-made long bow crafted from Yucca wood and spider thread.
A repeater reinforced with iron near the core, providing arrow stability.
A bow made from sandstone and reinforced fiber found near the trees of the desert.
Infused with magic derived from nature, it’s leafs are sharp and pungent.
Deadly toxin from toads is laced on the string and forged from mushroom.
The string is created from silk, hardened and flexible, derived from a deadly spider, ready to pounce your prey.
A bow that turns its arrows into frozen blocks of ice.
A crossbow that freezes arrows before they're sent flying.
A bow that shoots arrows at powerful speeds, reshaping the arrows to look like shooting stars.
A wand that casts a simple fire spell.
A wand that spits out red slime.
A wand that spits out green slime.
A wand that spits out blue slime.
A wand that creates leaves when shot.
A thin wand created from vines that cast lights of green energy.
An ancient wand hidden deep in the forest, used by the mages who used to live there long ago.
A wand that emits bolts of cactus Mammillaria Mystax.
A wand that has a crystal core. The crystal allows for any rain to be stored and redistributed at very fast speeds.
A wand that has a crystal core. The crystal allows for any rain to be stored and redistributed at very fast speeds.
A wand that shoots mucky magic, magic that was originated from the depths of the swamp.
A wand that spits out mushrooms.
A wand that kills enemies with kindness, casting flower magic at them.
A wand that uses the power of a frozen crystal.
A wand set ablaze by the crystals used when casting magic.
A wand that uses magic to freeze enemies until they burn a cold death.
A basic stone sword.
A short stone cutlass, dropped from a pirate.
A normal stone sword that has a sharp blade.
A sword with a large blade, although huge, it is really easy to handle.
An axe that puts plants to the test, strictly made for destroying.
A quartz sword forged from the minerals found under sand.
A basic stone sword forged with a handle made of sandstone allowing for enhanced precision.
A throwing hatchet, sturdy enough that when thrown, it doesn't break on impact.
A sword made from Damascus steel, sharp and very fast.
A giant axe, it has a heavy swing but can deal intense damage.
A sword that converts the energy of the sun into powerful rays.
A sword with a fine blade made of cobalt.
A sword that seems to have frozen over.
A magical wooden staff topped with a white crystal.
A magical wooden staff embedded with a red gem.
A staff that creates sharp leaf projectiles on command.
Thought of as a direct upgrade from the leaf staff, sprays even more powerful leaves on command.
A staff that is suppose to protect the forest, not to be used against it, casts gigantic rays of forest magic at your enemies.
A staff that casts cactus needles upon your enemies.
A staff that uses the a crystal to capture and release the heat of the desert.
There are only a few gems capable of capturing 100% of the heat from the desert, this staff uses one of them.
A staff made from mushrooms.
A basic spell for a wizard, the first spell they teach in mage school.
Spell that uses mana to casts fire upon your enemies.
Spell that uses mana to cast a burning flame upon many enemies.
A spell that when casted, ignites your enemies with an intense heat.
A spell that slowly consumes your enemies with poisonous magic.
To the outside, this spell may be seen as a basic ice spell that allows you to cast frost magic, but what they dont see is how effective it is at giving frostbite to the main targets.
A small stone shield, capable of some protection.
A sturdy shield, grants decent protection against attacks.
A very protective silver shield reinforced with infested with forest vines.
A solid shield capable of defending allies against powerful attacks allows for the user to bash their enemies back.
A shield that allows you to protect yourself and your allies against attacks that would normally pierce them.
Aid your allies with the protection of harden ice.
A holy book, the user is capable of reciting verses.
A holy book, it has some scriptures that were used long ago, pretty useless now though.
A book that holds ancient text, allowing for casting ancient forest healing techniques.
An ancient book hidden in the forest, assists nearby plants of growing and in return they heal you back.
A tome that purifies your enemies and bless your allies.
Provides a great healing boost using mushroom magic.
Allows for the use of the cold modified to your advantage.
A deadly wooden shuriken capable of tacticle fights
A deadly bronze shuriken capable of tacticle fights
A deadly nature shuriken capable of tacticle fights
A deadly sandstone shuriken capable of tacticle fights
A deadly runic shuriken capable of tacticle fights
A deadly glacier shuriken capable of tacticle fights
A deadly perma frost shuriken capable of tacticle fights
A deadly perma frost shuriken capable of tacticle fights
Drag on an item to reroll its score!
A sturdy leather robe.
A leather robe dyed with leaves.
A leather robe that absorbs magic of nearby plants.
A wooden robe created using a wood that acts as fiber, It feels like it grows with you.
A robe woven from cactus fabric!
A cactus robe enhanced in the desert by being covered with sand.
From the depth of the desert, a robe forged in lava by mysterious ancient beings.
A Robe belonging to the mages that reside in the swamp.
A robe made from mushroom fibers.
Glowing under the night sky, it has a weird aura.
Cobalt laced on the outerlayers of the robe, providing a nice boost to protection.
A robe protected with diamonds that supports both magical capabilities and protection.
An enchanters robe, protective and laced with magic gathering strips.
A hide made of some sturdy leather cloth.
A hide made using the leather of a boar.
A hide made using leather that was refined to allow agile movements.
A coat that was crafted to be keen in movement, used by elves before they were exterminated.
A sandstone hide covered in leaves.
A jacket completly covered in sandstone, provides an ample amount of protection.
A jacket made of gold, covered with obsidian as a base for its protection.
A hide made using great oak wood and covered in leaves.
A jacket made from a reflective fiber, allowing for enemies to see straight through you.
The black steel prevents any poison from getting through the fibers.
A hide made with cobalt, prioritizing magical capabilities.
Leather that was coated in diamonds, very protective.
Diamond-coated leather with an enchanted crystal that amplifies your lifeforce.
A necklace that holds a jade gemstone.
A ring that holds a huge jade gemstone.
The claw cut from the hand of a Rootwraith, pretty powerful.
A ring that holds a emerald gemstone.
An amulet that is strapped to a Golden Cross.
An amulet that is strapped to a Ruby.
A necklace that holds the teeth of a giant sand tortoise.
A ring that holds a Ruby Gemstone.
A necklace that holds a emerald Gemstone.
A pendant that hold an immense amount of dark energy.
A bracelet made from mud and leaves, allows for your wrists to move freely.
A Ring that is made from mushrooms.
A bronze medallion attached to a necklace, shaped like a sun.
A Diamond medallion attached to a necklace, shaped like a moon.
A ring made from Turquoise.
A crown made with diamonds.
A ring that holds a Sapphire gemstone.
Armor made from stone, not very protective and very heavy.
This Armor is made from metal, protective.
This Armor is made from a dense metal.
This Armor is made from a dense metal.
Protected by the forest, this armor grows feeding off of its user.
Chest piece with a vibrant coating of iron layered with vines.
Chest piece with a vibrant coating of iron supported with a coat of sandstone.
A Cobalt chestplate fully covered in sandstone, makes you feel as if you're in complete ownership of the desert.
Chestplate that was built using sand, covered in mud and reinforced with vines.
Organic Chestplate enhanced with magical essence from the plants that grow in the swamp.
Breastplate forged with Damascus steel and Carbon steel.
A breastplate that has a cobalt outline for protection.
Chainmail that allows the user to be agile while giving protection.
A chestplate that uses frozen diamonds to protect the user under vital situations.
Specially used by the Red beard pirates to dig up buried treasure.
King Red beard's prize possession. The skull of the previous pirate king dipped in pure gold.
A magical quiver that enchants arrows.
The scrappy ring given to every new adventurer seeking a challenge.
A powerful core used to rank powerful weapons up!
A powerful core used to rank powerful weapons up!
A powerful core used to rank powerful weapons up!
A powerful core used to rank powerful weapons up!
